name: howlingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone or something is howlingly funny or howlingly bad, for example, they are very funny or very bad: This smart film is howlingly funny. Her novels are deeply funny and howlingly sad, as only novels about real things can be.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film's script is howlingly awful.His work isn't usually howlingly bad, but his characters are always just a bit too cool.This dark, violent comedy is howlingly funny.One reviewer wrote: "He is howlingly funny and destined for greatness."
